item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 11, 2024 Today's Verse Matthew 11:28–30 [28] Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. [29] Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. [30] For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.” Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
